cancel-request-start.header: Cancel a request to return your documents

cancellation-received.p1: We have sent email confirmation to {{values.cnc-email}}.
cancellation-received.p2: The Home Office will contact you by telephone or email to tell you if your request has been cancelled.
cancellation-received.p3: Your request to return documents has not been cancelled until they contact you.

cancel-request-further-leave.header: Further leave to remain (permission to stay)
cancel-request-further-leave.p1: There are different categories of further leave to remain (also called permission to stay), depending on your circumstances.
cancel-request-further-leave.link-read-more: Read more about the types of further leave
cancel-request-further-leave.p2: to check which one you applied for.
cancel-request-further-leave.p3: You will have used an online form called 'FLR' to apply. You will have applied from inside the UK.
